fields.name: Books
fields.description: The Books category encompasses a wide range of literary works, including fiction, non-fiction, educational, and reference materials. From timeless classics to contemporary bestsellers, this category caters to readers of all ages and interests.

fields.name: Clothes
fields.description: The Clothes category presents a vibrant array of apparel and fashion essentials for every occasion and style preference. From casual wear to formal attire, this category offers a diverse selection of garments, accessories, and footwear to suit every taste and season.

fields.name: Technology
fields.description: The Technology category delves into the ever-evolving realm of innovations, gadgets, and digital advancements. From cutting-edge electronics to groundbreaking software, this category showcases the latest developments shaping our modern world.

fields.name: Food
fields.description: The Food category tantalizes the senses with a delectable assortment of culinary delights, recipes, and gastronomic experiences from around the globe. Dive into a world of flavors, textures, and aromas as you explore diverse cuisines, cooking techniques, and ingredients.
